page.title: 12GROVE HUNT-OFFICERS.
page.content: The Grove and Rufford Hunt is run by a committee,which has appointed three Joint Masters who are responsible for the management of the Hunt. The Masters provide part of the finance and the committee raises the remainder from amongst the followers who wish to hunt. The Masters employ a Huntsman,a Whipper In,two Grooms and a part-time Terrier man.Puppy walkers look after the individual hounds for some months,between leaving their mothers and returning to the pack. An amateur steeple chase,the Grove Point to Point is a major event organised by the Hunt.This event is now well supported and established in its own right. An annual Puppy Show is also organised by the Hunt Masters.
